name: Reinhard Pichler
content: Reinhard Pichler Skip to Content Top-level Navigation: Staff Education research Contact Services Current-level Navigation: Path: DBAI > staff > Reinhard Pichler Tools: Drucken Prof. Dr. Reinhard Pichler E-mail: reinhard.pichler@tuwien.ac.at Address: Institute of Logic and Computation Databases and Artificial Intelligence Group (DBAI) Technische Universität Wien Favoritenstrasse 9-11/3.Stock A-1040 Wien Phone:  (+43 1) 58801 / 192200 Office hours: by appointment (please send me a short mail) Courses in the Winter Term 2025/26 VU Theoretische Informatik (192.017) VU Complexity Theory (192.165) VU Introduction to Quantum Computing, Complexity Theory, and Algorithmics (192.042) VU Quantum Computing, Complexity Theory, and Algorithmics (192.043) SE Wissenschaftliches Arbeiten (group 192-02 of 193.052 ) IT-Projekte für Jugendliche (192.055) Praktika, Seminare, Bachelorarbeit Courses in the Summer Term 2025 Datenbanksysteme Vertiefung resp. Advanced Database Systems (184.780) Seminar aus Datenbanken (181.201) Seminar in Complexity Theory (184.687) IT-Projekte für Jugendliche (192.055) Praktika, Seminare, Bachelorarbeit Publications Please refer to DBLP Curriculum Vitae I got a master's degree from the University of Innsbruck (Mag.rer.nat. in Mathematics, 1991), another master's degree from the University of London (MSc in Mathematical Computation, 1992, at the Queen Mary College), and a PhD from the TU Wien (Dr.techn. in Computer Science, 2000). In 2001, I received my "habilitation" in Theoretical Computer Science. From 1992 to 2005, I worked in the Program and Systems Engineering Department (PSE) of the Siemens AG Österreich. Since July 2005, I have been a professor in the Databases and Artificial Intelligence Group (DBAI) of the TU Wien.
